text:
February 4, 1959
Dr. Maurice F. Seay, Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Maurice:
I would indeed be remiss if I did not
add ray expression of sincere appreciation to that
already voiced on behalf of NAEB by Harry Skornia.
One might challenge a statement that my appreciation
is deeper than Skornia*s, but certainly you wouldn't
challenge one of longer standing. As an oldtimer,
both at Illinois and in NAEB, it is a real pleasure
to note recognition given NAEB by the W. K. Kellogg
Foundation. While fast going out of NAEB offices,
I assure you of ray continued interest in and support
of those things for which NAEB stands.
With kind personal regards to you, and
to Mrs. Seay.
Sincerely,
^ Frank E. Schooley
Director of University
Broadcasting
FESfb
cc: Harry Skornia^
William Harley
